full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG GTZO BO RNAMS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I SRID GSUM DGRA LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG GTZO BO RNAMS LA @008B MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA SRID GSUM DGRA LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA NGAG 'DON GYI RIM PAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'OD SDONG GIS RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR DU GO BDE BA CI NAS KYANG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, RANG LA 'CHANG RTZONG RTZOM GSUM GYI YON TAN MED NA'ANG, ,^ PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I GSER ZHUN MAS GZHIR BYAS, ,'DI NI MI 'DON PA'I CHOS SKYONG 'GA' ZHIG RNAMS BZHAG NAS, ,KHA BSKONG BAR 'OS PA BSNAN TE, BLO BZANG MING 'CHOD PAS BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA'I NYID DO,, ,,MANGGA LAm BHA WANTU,, ,,)
